title: Emotional and Prosocial Behavioural Problems Among Saudi Children with Atopic Dermatitis
abstract: Background: Atopic dermatitis (AD) is one of the most prevalent chronic conditions in children. It is a global public health concern because of its burden on the health systems. The disease is usually associated with comorbidities including psychosocial and behavioural Key words:Dermatitis, Atopic, Mental Health, Children, Saudi Arabia problems.
